title: Rat Funk

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Disease**: Choose a target, any positive effects on them will be dispelled and they will become framed.
- **Item Drop**: Give another Koopa some Able juice, Cleansing them and giving Roleblock + Redirect immunity for this night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - All Koopas will know what negative effects currently affects them at the start of each night, Posted at the Faction chat.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who would oppose Lord Bowser.

desc:
Post 2116
*They are cowardly creatures, and will often run away from battle. Rat Funks are also extremely fast.*
